txt.en: 'Spiders are corruption. They are the enemy of all nature.\n\n'Let us break from tending the sapling, and focus on ridding the world of this terrible enemy, so that it cannot harm nature more than it already does lest, one day, they threaten every forest, even the home that we will make for your sapling.'
Return to Faranil at Glân Vraig and tell her that you have done what she asked, and that a great number of the Cragstone brood died this day.
Return to Glân Vraig and speak with Faranil
Spiders living in the craggy stones in the farthest reach of the Ettenmoors will one day pose a threat to the forest in the southern part of the Ettenmoors unless their numbers are controlled.
'The Cragstone brood dwells deep in the shadow of the mountains to the west. Go there, thin their number as they are an affront to all nature.'
'Your efforts will help preserve nature for all, my friend. We shall help to make the Ettenmoors safe for future generations.'
Faranil wants to eliminate the threat of the spiders that roam the Ettenmoors. The Cragstone brood is found far to the west. Make your way to them and cull the brood.
